title: Universal Financial Inclusion Among the Poorest
description: In 2021, 100% of Austria's poorest 40% of the population had access to financial services, showcasing a strong financial inclusion policy.

title: Minimal Losses from Theft and Vandalism
description: In 2021, Austrian firms reported only 0.5% of annual sales lost due to theft and vandalism, indicating a secure business environment.

title: Efficient Logistics Performance
description: Austria scored 4.3 out of 5 in 2022 on the logistics performance index for timely shipments, reflecting a robust logistics infrastructure.

title: Exceptional Maternal Health
description: In 2017, Austria recorded a maternal mortality ratio of just 1 per 100,000 live births, highlighting excellent maternal healthcare services.
